title: Caper Aioli
directions: First, gather and prepare your mise en place.
To prepare the aioli, in small bowl, whisk together the Cashew Sour Cream with all the remaining ingredients well.
Combine aioli with a variety of dishes, such as potato salad, or use as a sauce for appetizers or as a spread on sandwiches.
ingredients: • 2 tbsp red onion or shallot, minced
• 1 1/2 tbsp of sweetener (agave, yukon or honey)
